Class RunnableItem

java.lang.Object
de.rcblum.stream.deck.items.AbstractStreamItem
de.rcblum.stream.deck.items.RunnableItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
StreamKeyListener, StreamItem
public class RunnableItem extends AbstractStreamItem
This handle can be registered with the StreamDeck and will execute the given Runnable task when the stream deck button is pressed on release.
